channel.title: Hey i need help making a command to do an emote, hey guys plz help :o
channel.description:
hey i wanna make commands that make you do emotes, so like when i type,
::rock and it does this: 302 = rocks falling on head, plz help me out plz i really need help [br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2007, 08:44:37 PM[/size][hr]plz help!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
